policies.description: Defines the standard time limit for a customer to cancel a ticket purchase.

details.eligibility_cut_off: 2 hours prior to the scheduled event start time (as listed on the ticket)
details.action_required: Cancellation must be initiated through the app's 'My Tickets' section or via direct support chat.

policies.agent_response_template: You are eligible for a refund or exchange if the cancellation is submitted at least **2 hours** before the scheduled event start time.

policies.description: Details what fees are applied and how the money is returned.

details.service_fee_status: Non-refundable (standard service fees are retained upon cancellation)
details.cancellation_fee: A small administrative fee may apply upon refund initiation, deducted from the total refund amount.
details.refund_method: Refunds are processed back to the original payment method.

policies.agent_response_template: Please note that the non-refundable service fee is retained. The remaining balance will be returned to your original payment method within **5-10 business days**.

policies.description: Rules for customers who miss their scheduled event without prior cancellation.
policies.agent_response_template: If you do not cancel your tickets prior to the event start time and do not attend, your tickets are considered forfeited, and you will not be eligible for a refund or credit.

policies.description: Rules for when the event provider cancels or significantly changes the event.

details.notification: Customers will be notified by email or in-app message.

policies.agent_response_template: If the event is cancelled or significantly postponed by the provider, you will automatically receive a **full refund**, including all service fees. No action is required from your side.
